divs: sighting detailsarea: levittown, pa (falls twp) i was sitting on my front porch around 8:30\8:45pm (eastern time)getting fresh air. was a cooler night. as i was sitting there this huge fireball came flying across the sky. moving at a steady pace. it was traveling in an eastward direction. i got up and stood in my driveway while this object passed over. i could not see an aircraft, only the fireball. it was huge. a bright orange\red fireball. i have never seen anything of that nature before. it was not a falling star. the object continued traveling eastward at the same pace until i could no longer see it. i went back out an hour later to see if anything else was flying over and saw nothing. there was something up in the sky.
Summary: Huge Fireball moving Eastward at a steady pace. Orange/Red in color.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Trenton
There were no other sightings in Trenton on or around August 9th 2008
